reviewText: Product quality was just as said, theres big name actors in these movies and the B rated genre does it good. I say buy it, great price.

Since it costs MORE for the one film I wanted --- alone --- on Blu-ray, I suppose I would be NUTZ to pass on t-h-i-s money-saving op- portunity. Only --- so far --- seen the Mega Shark vs Crocosaurus film that has the grown-up Jaleel "Steve Urkel" White as a Naval Lieutenant. Silly entertainment saved by the actors' willingness to keep a straight-face. The resolution is---I have a 55" Sony Bravia---is on-par with any single film Blu-Ray that I have, and better than SOME. I mean, REALLY, is there ANYTHING more terrifying than being stranded on a deserted tropical island with naked women and two-headed sharks? Watch out WHAT you wish for! Arrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrgh!
